page.shortlink: api thread monitor cpu usage function
page.description: Xbasic monitors CPU usage for the thread using settings provided.
page.prototype: V THREAD_MONITOR_CPU_USAGE(C ThreadName, N MaxCPUPercent [,N MonitorTime [,N RecoveryTime[,C LogMessage]]])

argument.name: MonitorTime
argument.description: How often the usage is checked. Default is 5 sec.

argument.name: RecoveryTime
argument.description: How long a thread remains at a lowered priority. Defaults to 300 sec.(5 min.)
